Sentencas: A simulated coke oven gas (COG) is used as internally-reformed (IR) fuel in an anode of solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes (DSC-SOFC) and the durability of the cell is studied.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: The DSC-SOFC operates stably for over 240 h when the steam to methane (H2O/CH4) ratio is above 3 with performance degradation of about 0.01% per hour, but it has a larger degradation of about 0.08% per hour when the H2O/CH4 ratio is lower than 2.5.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: The mechanism of the cell degradation has been analyzed in detail.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: It is found that the H2O/CH4 ratio approximately equal to 1 is the key point affecting cell performance.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: The results of cell analysis by energy dispersive spectroscopy and Raman spectroscopy indicate that carbon deposition mainly takes place at the inlet and at the middle of DSC-SOFC.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: Due to thick anode substrate in this type of cell, carbon distribution on the cross-section reveals that there are two carbon producing areas, one close to the anode surface, and the other near the three-phase boundary.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: Some of the deposited carbon can be carried by the fuel gas to exhaust which lowers the actual carbon amount in the cell, thus prolonging the cell operation.
Titulo: Durability of direct-internally reformed simulated coke oven gas in an anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell based on double-sided cathodes
